articles.author: PBS News Hour
articles.title: News Wrap: At least 16 dead amid catastrophic flooding in Central Europe - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: In our news wrap Monday, at least 16 people have died amid catastrophic flooding in Central Europe, Palestinian officials say Israeli airstrikes killed 16 people across the Gaza Strip, the U.S. State Department marked the second anniversary of Mahsa Amini's d…
articles.content:
Sejal Karia:
Such is the size and scale of the flooding across Central Europe, it's being called a catastrophe.
In Poland, raging rivers and torrential downpours have swallowed whole towns and vill… [+1292 chars]
